resources.string: The biceps is the muscle that receives the most attention from guys at the gym and from girls outside the gym. Make sure to treat your biceps the right way.
Adding a back-focused workout to your fitness routine will not only improve your overall strength but can reduce back pain and support great form and posture.
Abs and chest workouts strengthen the muscles around the spine and improve posture as the body\'s weight is correctly distributed. Also, who wouldn\'t want a 6 pack?
Cardio training exercises are the ones that increase our heart rate the most, increase our resistance and improve our physical condition.
Leg workouts are an important aspect of a balanced, whole-body fitness routine that builds strength, speed, and stability. Guys, make sure not to skip leg day.
If you\'re looking for weight loss and muscle definition, full body workouts are the way to go because the maximize calorie burn and strengthen all muscle groups.

The ketogenic diet (or keto diet, for short) is a low carb, high fat diet that offers many health benefits. In fact, many studies show that this type of diet can help you lose weight and improve your health. Ketogenic diets may even have benefits against diabetes, cancer, epilepsy, and Alzheimerâ€™s disease
